feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Chore/update csp posthog by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13455

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.1...2.23.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Assert length on search tests, fixes bug in SQS around onEmptyReturn by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13456

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.2...2.23.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ignore key action if posthog survey is focused by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13466

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.3...2.23.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't attempt account portal build if OSS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13467
  • Reduce duplication in search.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13459
  • Use correct variable for checking OSS user (or fork) in CI build by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13468
  • Increase the base Minio storage to 2Gi in Helm chart. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13472
  • Allow specifying sidecars for the pods in our Helm chart. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13473
  • "Download file" app action by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13348
  • Allow specifying extra volume mounts for containers in our Helm chart. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13476
  • [Added] ssoId field into AccountSSO type by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13475

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.4...2.23.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.23.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • adds sidepanel open and close actions, and gives the user the option to disable click-outside closure of sidepanel by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13463
  • Add tests for sorting to search.spec.ts by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13469
  • Rename search.spec.ts helpers to better reflect their purpose. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13484
  • Add some more range tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13485
  • Revert "adds sidepanel open and close actions, and gives the user the option to disable click-outside closure of sidepanel" by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13487
  • Simplify Camunda account-portal local dev setup by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13482
  • Add snippets to app imports by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13417
  • Commenting FieldType enumeration by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13489
  • Add tests for array column types, fixing some bugs along the way. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13491
  • SQS relationship support by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13483
  • Ensure normal spectrum colors are used for nested links in top navs by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13497
  • Making meta required in QueryJson by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13501
  • bumping pro sm by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13502

New Contributors

  • @mikesealey made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13463

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.23.5...2.23.6
